name: The Intern (SAE Athens Games)
description:
The SAE Athens student's entry to the 2023 IGF Competition

Trouble strikes in the Land of Limbo! 

The great eternal lawyer suffered a tragic reincarnation accident, and now **you**, a humble intern, have been thrust into the Grand Courtroom of Eternity. Prepare your case, pick your witnesses, organize the evidence, and present your case to the Supreme Being.

- - -

Accuse Cleopatra, acquit Genghis Khan, prove that Confucius was responsible for all those crop circles, and find someone --someone famous-- to blame for the mystical powers of the Pyramids!
